name: Cossack Souls
description:
Cossacks - Ukrainian warriors of the 16th-17th centuries. These were Ukrainian peasants who became soldiers, forming a special society. Cossacks were united by the ideals of freedom and independence. At the cost of their own lives, they defended Ukrainian lands from invaders. Today, Ukrainians still glorify their Cossack heritage to demonstrate their indomitability.

They are united by the ideals of freedom and independence, and they practice military might, which they learned from their ancestors many centuries ago.

You as cossack should discover your roots and beat all enemies on your way. You can add some great persons of history to your squad and get bonus for game.
